definition: A work shift that typically occurs at the end of the week, specifically during the period between Friday evening and Sunday evening. It is commonly associated with certain industries or professions, where employees are required to work during weekends to ensure continuous operations or provide essential services.

examples.english: I have a shift on the weekend.

examples.german: Die Wochenendschicht beginnt um 8 Uhr morgens.
examples.english: The weekend shift starts at 8 am.
My friend regularly works weekend shifts.
The weekend shift is particularly stressful.
